title: Cinnamon Streusel Muffins
directions: Preheat oven to 350ÂºF. Spray cavities with vegetable spray or line with baking cups.

In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon and salt. In small bowl, whisk milk, egg and melted butter until well blended. Stir wet ingredients into dry ingredients, mixing only until moistened. Do not overmix. Divide batter into muffin cups. For topping, combine flour, sugar and cinnamon. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Sprinkle evenly over muffins.
Bake 16-18 minutes or until golden brown.
